mapper.update: update t_staff_msg set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eduBackground = #{eduBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryTime = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, politicalStatus = #{politicalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salaryLevel = #{salaryLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, gender, birthday, idCard, eduBackground, phone, mail, address, entryTime, politicalStatus, salaryLevel from t_staff_msg where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, gender, birthday, idCard, eduBackground, phone, mail, address, entryTime, politicalStatus, salaryLevel from t_staff_msg
